base_mods.misc_desc: Computers hit by this grenade lose all programming and data.

A droid hit by this grenade must make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Resilience check[b] or suffer 1 strain plus 1 strain per [FAILURE]. [DESPAIR] or [THREAT][THREAT][THREAT] can cause memory loss, at GM discretion.

name: HIC "Mercy" Grenade
description: Please see page 45 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: A character hit by this grenade must make a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Resilience check[b] or become disoriented for 1 round per [THREAT]. Additionally, he has an inaccurate or incomplete memory of the encounter.

name: Spore/B Stun Grenade
description: Please see page 107 of the Strongholds of Resistance Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: The first time a character hit by this grenade (even if he suffers no damage) must roll a single [CH]. As long as the character doesn't roll a [DE], he is affected normally.  If he rolls a [DE], he immediately suffers 6 strain and begins to suffocate.  A [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Medicine check[b] is required to stop the subject from suffocating.

base_mods.misc_desc: May be loaded with 1 dose of neurotoxin, anesthetic, or neuroparalytic, or other suitable toxins.

Droids, or characters equipped with sealed suits, breath masks, respirators, or rebreathers, are unaffected.

base_mods.misc_desc: May be loaded with 1 dose of synthetic neuroparalytic or any other poison.  Whenever wielder successfully attacks a target, even if no damage is dealt, the target suffers the effects of the poison.

name: NX-14 Needler
description: Please see page 42 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Removes all [SE] added by a personal deflector shield.
Adds [SE] to Perception checks to find a concealed needler on an individual.

name: Crossguard Lightsaber
description: Please see page 42 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May spend [DE] or [TH][TH][TH] on enemy Melee or Lightsaber check to disarm enemy.

name: Lightwhip
description: Please see page 42 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May spend [AD][AD] or [TR] to prevent opponent from using Parry to reduce damage.

name: Philaxian Phase-Knife
description: Please see page 43 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: When used with the Saber Throw talent, may spend [AD][AD] or [TR] instead of [FP] to have phase-knife return to the wielder's hand.

name: Crossguard Lightsaber Hilt
description: Please see page 43 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: May spend [DE] or [TH][TH][TH] on enemy Melee or Lightsaber check to disarm enemy.

name: Concussion Mine
description: Please see page 64 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Connor Net Mine
description: Please see page 64 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Firecracker Mine
description: Please see page 64 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: When a vessel is struck by a firecracker mine, each occupant is disoriented for three rounds.

name: Gravity Mine
description: Please see page 64 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Creates a gravitic bubble, preventing all ships within long range from entering hyperspace.

name: Ion Mine
description: Please see page 64 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Seeker Mine
description: Please see page 64 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Character who set mine can spend [TH][TH] from target pilot's [B]Piloting (Space) check[b] to force the pilot to repeat the check at one less difficulty.

name: "Precision-X" Marksman Rifle
description: Please see page 44 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: When set to stun, range changes to medium.

name: "Subduer-9" Riot Blaster
description: Please see page 44 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: "Firecaller" Light Flame Projector
description: Please see page 44 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Grapnel-Harpoon Launcher
description: Please see page 45 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: As an action, make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Ranged (Light) check[b] to secure hook to an object within medium range.
Once secured, the cord may be reeled in as an action.
To pull another character aloft, must succeed in an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Athletics check[b].

name: "Impact" Repulsor Cannon
description: Please see page 45 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Anti-Armor Micro-Rocket
description: Please see page 46 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Explosive Micro-Rocket
description: Please see page 46 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Flechette Micro-Rocket
description: Please see page 46 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Incendiary Micro-Rocket
description: Please see page 46 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Ion Micro-Rocket
description: Please see page 47 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: "Peacekeeper" Stun Baton
description: Please see page 48 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Ion Pike
description: Please see page 48 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

name: Micro-Rocket Launcher Pistol
description: Please see page 47 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.

base_mods.misc_desc: Up to three micro-rockets can be loaded into the launcher.  Use the fired rocket's profile, but the launcher's range, if longer.
